allow: Bash(for file in about.html contact.html product-detail.html products.html)
Bash(do sed -i 's|
Bash(for file in contact.html product-detail.html products.html)
Bash(do sed -i 's|.*FM''''s Power.*|\\n \\n |g' "$file")

Bash(do sed -i 's|\\.logo-icon svg { width: 24px; height: 24px; }|.logo-icon svg { width: 24px; height: 24px; }\\n\\n    .logo-image {\\n      height: 50px;\\n      width: auto;\\n      object-fit: contain;\\n    }|g' "$file")
